definitions.definition: Treating serious issues with (often deliberately ) inappropriate humour ; flippant .
examples: Robbie's joke about Heather's appearance was just him being facetious .

definitions.definition: humorously silly or counterproductive for the purpose of sarcastically advocating the opposite .

main_definition: Treating serious issues with (often deliberately ) inappropriate humour ; flippant .
secondary_definitions: (Of an idea or statement ) humorously silly or counterproductive for the purpose of sarcastically advocating the opposite .
